title: Game wont open PLS HELP
body:
I click the icon on my desktop, the screen with the "launch" button shows up. I click it and nothing, I have gone into my task manager and again nothing in the applications but it is in the "processes" tab. I have no idea why it wont load up.

I have tried multiple times to re-install the client and hasn't done anything to help..

Someone pls help me find a solution

replies.body:
This issue commonly indicates that there's an issue with your PC establishing a solid connection to our login servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings have been properly configured for League.

Let me know if these steps resolve this.
